meanings.sent1: I am learning espanol in school.
meanings.sent3: My dog barks in espanol when he sees a cat.
meanings.sent4: The music of the city was a blend of espanol and jazz.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the kitchen was filled with the flavors of espanol cuisine.

meanings.sent1: The espanol helped me find my way in the foreign city.
meanings.sent2: The group of espanol at the event was very friendly.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous espanol played a prank on his friend.
meanings.sent4: She was a ray of sunshine, her laughter like sweet espanol.
meanings.sent5: The old man shared stories of his travels with the young espanol.
